author: brondsem
msg: move each group of DTDs into their own catalog; the master catalog just references them.  This makes it easier for external tools to import just the forrest DTDs

author: cfieber
msg: patch from stephen for gump fix

author: mss
msg: bug 3717: Loading PlugIns from outside @INC didn't work because do() looks in @INC, too, for relative paths.  Fixed by always using absolute paths.
* Added Justin's regression test for this feature.
* Marked some tests which missed the bit as executable.

author: felicity
msg: bug 3705: relative scores worked when all 4 scoresets were specified, but not when only 1 number was given.  fix that, and fix debug output to use the correct variable.  also, instead of 2 sections for 'score rule # # # #' and 'score rule #', always assume all 4 scoresets are specified and deal with the 1 score=>4 scores bit appropriately.
